runs.comm: Here we go. Full length delivery just outside off, Kamran, who doesn't like to come forward, lunges out to push it towards mid-off.
banged in short outside off stump, Warner ducks. Wide called. Afridi is surprised with that call.
loud shout for lbw but it pitched just outside leg stump. Another one coming with the left-armer's natural angle .. Akmal is caught on the crease, his balance went awry and he played all around it ..
similar delivery and this time Kamran gets the front foot out of the way to defend
fuller, around the off stump, driven to mid-off and there is confusion between the two batsmen about the single.. yes no and NO
pushes this length delivery out to the off side. Nagging first over from Nannes. Line, length and pacy.
slings it full outside off, Salman reaches out to squeeze it away off the edge to left of second slip who gets a hand on it .. It was all along the ground btw
the first bouncer of the game. On the middle stump line. Kamran goes down under
another one climbing outside off, from short of length, Kamran is off balance as he tries to upper cut it over point and carves it to right of third man. They run just a single there. Hmmm
yet another short delivery. This time its Salman who ducks. Two bouncers already in this over.
And the third one arrives. This one sails high over Salman. Wide. Nannes hit the full length. Tait is bowling short.
lands this one on a length on the off and middle line, Salman pushed out to the off side
full again this time, Salman leans forward to defend it to the off side. he was late in getting forward.
full in length around off stump line, pushed forward to the off side
gets forward to tap this one to the on side
Whack. Kamran backs away to the on side and slams the length delivery flat over covers!
Thrash! What a shot. Another length delivery around the off stump and Kamran goes through the line. Awesome. The ball flies well to the right of mid-off
Will it be short? Will it be a yorker? will it be a slower one? Well .. it's an overpitched delivery well down the leg side.
Kamran is going for it. He moves to the leg side and tries to clear mid-on ... he doesn't connect well and ends up swiping it past the bowler ..
This time around, he moves to the off side and flicks to midwicket
fullish, around the off stump line, pushed out to covers
full and well outside off stump, the keeper collects. Must have been borderline wide call
he presses back, waits for the back of length delivery to arrive outside off and uses that bottom-hand of his to almost wrist it through cover point. Shot!
Thump! Immense fun this. It was slightly short in length outside off and Salman plays a cracking square cut
on the middle and leg, at the body, clipped to square-leg
Flood of runs here. Pakistan are counterattacking in style. The bouncer on the leg and middle line and Kamran goes for the pull and ends up dragging it to fine-leg boundary
full in length on the middle, tapped to the on side

drama in the zone just outside off stump, Salman tries to run it down to third man but doesn't connect. it appears, had actually edged it to the keeper. But there was no appeal! TV replays show a nick!
Loverly shot there! Salman sashays down the track and blasts the shortish delivery outside off to point boundary. Imperious!
on the stumps, fuller, pushed out to the off side
leans forward to drive to deep cover
slow off cutter, outside off stump, tries to cut and misses
leans forward to drive to mid-off . Seventh ball of the over. Not sure whether we missed any no-ball call
shovels this one over midwicket .. he was trying to pull but didn't connect all that well
bouncer just outside leg stump, Butt goes down under
charges down the track and flays it over extra cover... Butt showing lots of intent
works this one through the on side
fullish, on the off and middle line, pushed out to extra cover
full in length on the leg stump line, flicked wide of mid-on
Swept ala Chanderpaul there if you know what i mean. Will get a single
DRopped by 'Haddin ! It was going away from Kamran who goes for the cut but gets the bottom edge .. and it goes below the gloves.
charges down the track and tries to loft it over mid-off and it dipped rapidly on him and turned. He ended up edging it over backward point ..
outside off stump, squeezed out to point
Thump! What a fab hit. He rushed down the track and lifted it with turn over the long-off fielder. They are taking on the spinner here.
backs away to cut this leg break to sweeper cover

Australia look stunned here. Mitch is shaking his head. Clarke stares ahead. THe pakistan dug out has come alive. IT was a short delivery outside off, Butt stays adjacent to the line, opens his bat-face and slashes it through the vacant slip region
works this one past point
Hello! hello! Kamran, suddenly, goes for a slog. He goes across the line and makes no contact.
presses his front foot forward and flat-bats the short-of-length delivery over midpn!
tries to drive on the up but mistimes it towards cover
leans forward to tap this full delivery towards point for a single. Great start this for Pakistan.
Look at the white ball fly! Absolute thump! Kamran cleared the front foot and bashed the full length delivery over the straight boundary.
carves this length delivery to left of long-off where Warner almost over runs it but adjusts to lunge back and stop
crouches to square drive this one past point
slower one on the middle, Salman swats this one to midwicket
What a fab piece of timing! Pakistan are playing awesomely here. It was a full toss and Kamran just concentrated on getting the timing right. He carves it clear of the sweeper cover.

Cracking cut! 50 for Kamran in 32 balls. What an innings this. Semi-final of the World CUp and he is turning it on. Short and outside off stump, Kamran stays beside the line and slaps it to the point boundary.
full delivery ,driven down the pitch and the bowler gets an hand to it and stops
around the off stump line, pushed out to cover point
slower off cutter, Kamran tries to swing it over midwicket but doesn't make contact ..
What a catch from Warner! Stunning! Kamran falls after an awesome knock. He drove this one uppishly towards deep cover where Warner rushed forward and threw himself forward to take the catch
pushes this one down the leg side
around the  off stump, Salman uses the bottom-hand to almost cut it from the off stump to third man
full in length, on the middle, on driven to long-on
leans forward to flick this one past square-leg
from round the stumps, on the middle stump line, driven to sweeper cover
gets forward to push this one to cover
moves down the track and drives to long-off
again drives inside-out but straight to cover
full , almost on the blockhole, dug out to short third man

Warner again. The openers are gone now. Salman went down on his knee to swing it over square-leg but found the man in the deep. Warner moved to his left to take a running catch. Australia trying their best to get back
Smashed! What a thumping slog sweep. He cleared the front foot and crashed it to the cow corner
plays the sweep more delicately, more softly this time to get a single
turning away from Afridi who chops it to backward point
full and outside off stump, almost flat bats it sweeper cover. Much like how Kamran would have played
plays the sweep shot to retain the strike
starts his spell with a wide down the leg side. Afridi walks towards square-leg. Nannes grimaces.
on the legs, flicked away to deep square-leg region for a single
full pitched on the middle stump line, worked through midwicket
length delivery on the off and middle, Afridi taps it quietly to cover point for a single .. it was a slower one and he adjusted well
full, very full on the middle and leg, Umar leans across to take it on the full and plays a paddle scoop over short fine-leg for couple of runs
some width on offer outside off stump, Umar throws his bat at it and slices it to third man
on the middle and leg line, shoveled to midwicket for a single
moves outside leg, Tait slips it really full on the middle, Afridi reaches out, takes his bottom-hand of the bat and slices the ball to third man
Yorker that goes for four byes! It swung in late and went between the legs of Umar and flies to the left of Haddin who dives but can't reach
slips in a slower one this time and it has been swatted down the track
full toss on the middle, picked away towards deep midwicket. Umar must feel he has missed out there.
loverly slower one .. Afridi had backed away and was made to wait and wait. And wait. The ball eventually slips past the bat and past the off stump
bangs this one short and Afridi pulls it to wide long-on for couple of runs
driven to long-off where Warner stops

Big moment this. Afridi is gone. IT was a full delivery outside off and Afridi tried to heave it away but ended up slicing it towards point. WAtson came in, Haddin rushed out and both collided but Haddin takes it. He was the man with the gloves and it was his catch.
plays the reverse sweep and gets it to third man regio nfor couple of runs
reaches forward to drive to long-off for a single
on the off stump line, tapped to point for a single
David Hussey is the surprise package here. Another tight over. Full and almost on the yorker length outside off, tries to square drive and is beaten
leans forward to on drive to long-on
slows up the pace, floats a dipping full toss, flat-batted to long-off
goes for the swing across the line and edges it over to midwicket .. no one there
tries to turn it to square-leg region, misses and it bounds off the pad
Wallop! Thunderous hit! It lands on the roof and goes out of the ground! Latif reached forward and whacked it high over midwicket. Fierce slog sweep!
Crunch! It was floated full outside off and Latif carves it hard and to the right of long-off where Hussey makes a desperate diving effort to stop but ..
Good bye! That's a crunching six. Umar clears the front foot and knives through the line. What a hit. The ball flew over wide long-on boundary
Aaha! The paddle-shot! He leans across to paddle scoop it over short fine-leg boundary! Kamran jumps out from his seat in the dug out! Immense fun!
Gully cricket hit! He moved away and it was the bouncer and he took his eyes off the ball, weaved away from the line of fire and flat-batted it to wide long-on! Like a forehand slap across the court
full in length and outside off, Umar goes after it but doesn;t make contact
fullish around the off stump, he reaches out to swat it over the bowler's head!
Warner again. Simple catch this time. It was the short delivery around off stump, Latif tried to pull but was in no position for it. The ball lobbed of the edge to mid-off
Meaty crunchy blow. What a talent. A spine-tingling excitement. Mitch hurls it on the middle and Umar pulls it away to the midwicket boundary
shuffles to the off stump and tries to swing across the line and misses the slow off cutter. So does Brad Haddin. He was called Bad Hands by some early in his career.

Fabulicious! Mitch just puts his head down and walks back quickly. It was the bouncer and Umar was on the front foot but goes through with the swivel pull shot and the white ball flies over backward square-leg boundary
yorker length, dug out to the off side for a single
fullish, on the off stump line, eased towards mid-off

Kamran is screaming! The Pak fans are dancing. And Umar is indulging himself imperiously in the middle. What an knock. He cleared the front foot and crashed the ball over wide midwicket boundary. 50 up! What a little gem of an knock.
hands the strike to Umar with a push to mid-off
really full outside off, pushed through mid-off for a single
Delicious hit! Very typical hit from Razzaq. That front leg was cleared, that bat swung down and went through the line and the ball flew over long-on
pushes this full and outside off and Haddin can't collect
swung to long-on for a single
pushed towards extra cover for a single .. hold on... Clarke fires it wide at the non-striker'ss end to give overthrows. Hmm .. Rattled
another wide down the off side. The wheels are coming off
drives it down the ground to retain the strike. Last over coming up.
full pitched outside off stump, hit hard but straight to sweeper cover
lovely yorker on the middle and leg, just about squeezed out to the off side for a single. Two balls for two runs so far.
full and well outside the off stump, just inside the wide line.. swing and a miss.. Haddin collects and under-arms the throw but  by then they are across.
The slower one this time ... Umar moves to the off side and tries to paddle scoop it but doesn't connect .. and they repeat what they did last ball - run a bye
Razzaq is run out It was a wide outside off and they again tried to steal the bye but this time Haddin relayed the throw to the bowler who hurled down the stumps at the non-striker's end
full toss outside off stump, slashed to deep point region where Warner rushes to make the stop.
Misbah is run out almost yorker length delivery,mistimed to the bowler.. Misbah had charged across, Umar stays there and puts his head down .. And Mitch does the rest.
